alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 17 at 10:41PM PST until December 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility as low as a quarter mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges and roadways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
